name: idb shim
tagline: Indexed db like API on top of native, websql or memory implementation
body:
### idb_shim.dart

Largely inspired from javascript [IndexedDBShim](http://nparashuram.com/IndexedDBShim/) polyfill over WebSql. This pure dart polyfill works over native (indexeddb), websql and memory (i.e. not persistent). Checkout 
* the [project source code](https://github.com/alextekartik/idb_shim.dart)
* the [samples](http://alextekartik.github.io/idb_shim_samples.dart/).

As the project is just starting, let me know if you have existing project using indexeddb for which you would like to make the transition (to support safari/iOS for example).

For the record, the memory implementation is not working properly yet when using dart2js
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
